Texts.Eng: I'll present the blueprints to my father in a few days, when he returns from his trip to Hyzolia. I think - and hope - he'll be pleased. In the meantime, I think I may start working on my next weapon. I had a concept for a plasma-infused projectile that releases some of its energy whenever it hits a hard surface. If I can get it to work with the ricocheting projectiles made by my brother, I think this weapon could cause quite the mayhem on the battlefield.

Jaren Erito - Log Entry 73

I've finally completed the blueprints for my latest weapon, the Nauroo. I faced many issues in designing this dual-barrel rocket launcher, but with some help, the plans have finally been completed. My brother designed cheaply-produced targeting chips for the missiles, allowing the user to fire and forget - no laser guidance needed.
The abandoned notes of an Erito Security engineer.
